info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Union County through 330 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monroe, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Weddington, Wesley Chapel, Wingate, Marshville, Mineral Springs, Waxhaw, Indian Trail, Marvin and Unionville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
